DOC.brief_summary: To assess analgetic effect nitrousoxide-oxygen inhalation pain perception 12-15 year old child 1 ) dental pulp ; 2 ) masseter muscle ; 3 ) skin upper lip
DOC.brief_title: Analgetic Effect Nitrousoxide-oxygen Inhalation Dental Treatment Children
DOC.detailed_description: The present study randomize , cross-over blind study analgetic effect nitrousoxide-oxygen sensitivity dental pulp , skin muscle . It conduct healthy 12-15 year old Danish child attend public school municipality Aarhus , Denmark
